name: Abyss - Idle Miner
description:
A clicker idle game about mining rocks to descend into the abyss.

This game is made during the Game Jam Mini Jam 109: Depth(s).

Click on the Boulder at the left screen to start your abyss journey. The more rocks you collect, the deeper you descend into the abyss. Attention: This is a prototype game and therefore no saving system. Do not refresh the site or you will lose your progress.

-

See updates in development log below. [Last News]

-

Team: 1 (me) - Developer, Artist, Animator, Programmer
